text: and patents resulting from NIH funding.  - PubMed is a free service of the U.S. National Library of Medicine that lets you search millions of journal citations and abstracts in the fields of medicine, nursing, dentistry, veterinary medicine, the health care system, and preclinical sciences.  NIH Clinical Research Trials and You helps people learn more about clinical trials, why they matter, and how to participate.
